quote: If you’ve ever lost someone that you love, and I say ‘love’ and not ‘loved’ because even when they’re gone, you still love them, you know that never goes away, but your life changes.
quote_letters: IF YOUVE EVER LOST SOMEONE THAT YOU LOVE AND I SAY LOVE AND NOT LOVED BECAUSE EVEN WHEN THEYRE GONE YOU STILL LOVE THEM YOU KNOW THAT NEVER GOES AWAY BUT YOUR LIFE CHANGES
